coms309.controller

Class AssignmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • coms309.controller.AssignmentController

  • @RestController
public class AssignmentController
extends Object
    Controller for assignment endpoints

    HTTP 200 = good request.

    HTTP 202 = good request and data has been changed.

    HTTP 403 = incorrect permission.

    HTTP 404 = user or data not found.

      • getAssignment

        @GetMapping(value="/assignment/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiAssignment> getAssignment(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                 long id,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                 String token)
        Get an assignment from its id.

        Client must be student, teacher or admin.

        Get request, path "/assignment/{id}".

        Parameters:
        id - assignment's id
        token - permission token
        Returns:
        HTTP response, assignment data
